#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int m, n, i, max=0;

	scanf("%d %d\n", &m, &n);

	int array[m];
	for(i=0; i<m; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &array[i]);
		if(i == 0)
			max = array[i];
		else if(array[i] >= max)
			max = array[i];
	}

	if( n == 1 && m == 1 && array[0] == 1)
	{
		printf("YES");
		return 0;
	}

	else if ( n%2 == 0)
	{
		if( max <= (n/2))
			printf("YES");
		else
			printf("NO");
	}

	else if( n%2 != 0 )
	{
		if( max <= (n/2 +1) )
			printf("YES");
		else
			printf("NO");
	}


	return 0;
}
